alert.note: Alert for Ellis (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 09 at 11:38AM CDT until May 09 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CDT FOR NORTHERN ELLIS COUNTY... At 1138 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Emmeram, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Catherine and Emmeram. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
